title: NonNested
body:
This is a test line
-> Option 1
	This is the first option
-> Option 2
	This is the second option
This is after both options

title: NonNestedHashtag
body:
-> Option 1#someHashtag#someOtherHashtag #lastHashtag//#ignore
	This is the first option
-> Option 2
	This is the second option

title: NonNestedComment
body:
-> Option 1// This is a comment {$ignore} <<if $ignore>> #ignore
	This is the first option
-> Option 2
	This is the second option

title: Nested
body:
text
-> shortcut1a
	Text1
	-> nestedshortcut1
		NestedText1
	-> nestedshortcut2
		NestedText2
-> shortcut2a
	Text2
more text

title: Conditional
body:
This is a test line
-> Option 1
	This is the first option
-> Option 2<<if 1 == 0>>
	This is the second option
-> Option 3
	This is the third option
This is after both options

title: ConditionalComment
body:
This is a test line
-> Option 1
	This is the first option
-> Option 2<<if 1 == 0>>// I should be ignored
	This is the second option
-> Option 3
	This is the third option
This is after both options

title: ConditionalHashtag
body:
This is a test line
-> Option 1
	This is the first option
-> Option 2<<if 1 == 0>>#someHashtag #someOtherHashtag
	This is the second option
-> Option 3
	This is the third option
This is after both options

title: EmptyConditional
